dict.key: I watch the boy playing foot ball
My good friend told me a story
dict.string: 我的好朋友给我讲了一个故事
李莉注意到两只狗打架
dict.key: I looked at her flying a kite
The lion ordered the hen to give him some eggs
dict.string: 那头狮子命令那只母鸡给他一些鸡蛋
dict.key: He wanted you to go with him
Li Yang told the little boy to go home
dict.string: 李扬叫那个小男孩回家
dict.key: She asks me to help her
My parents leave me some money
dict.string: 我的父母亲留给我一些钱
